contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=April 2009}} '''XHNGS-FM''' 96.7 MHz is a radio station owned by [[MVS Radio]] as part of FM Globo, located in [[Nogales, Sonora]], [[Mexico]]. The station primarily plays love songs sung in Spanish, although it sometimes plays songs in English. The station does not have a website, but it may have plans to create one soon. It can be heard on the other side of the [[U.S.-Mexico border]] in [[Nogales, Arizona]], reasonably well in [[Green Valley, Arizona]], and in a very weak signal in [[Tucson, Arizona]]. {{coord missing|Mexico}} {{Nogales Radio}} [[Category:Radio stations in Sonora]] [[Category:Nogales, Sonora]] [[Category:Radio stations established in 1955]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
